title: PhD Research: Radio source multipicity and Machine Learning.
description: Developing tools to create true associations between separated radio sources using morphological, spectral and flux analysis of the source to feed into a neural network to learn characteristics of these associations. This will allow for quick processing of SKA and future radio observational data.
